mapper.select: SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID , A.ARTICLE_TITLE , A.ARTICLE_CONTENT , A.ARTICLE_CATEGORY , A.ARTICLE_CREATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_LAST_UPDATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_VIEW_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_LIKE_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPLY_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPORT_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_MAX_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_RECRUITMENT_DEADLINE , A.ARTICLE_QUESTION_CATEGORY , A.USER_CODE , A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_CURRENT_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_PENDING_MEMBER_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_DELETE_STATUS FROM ARTICLE A

SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID , A.ARTICLE_TITLE , A.USER_CODE , A.ARTICLE_CATEGORY , A.ARTICLE_CONTENT , A.ARTICLE_LIKE_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPLY_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_VIEW_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_CREATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_QUESTION_CATEGORY FROM ARTICLE A WHERE ARTICLE_CATEGORY = 2;

SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID , A.ARTICLE_TITLE , A.ARTICLE_CONTENT , A.ARTICLE_CATEGORY , A.ARTICLE_CREATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_LAST_UPDATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_VIEW_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_LIKE_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPLY_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPORT_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_MAX_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_RECRUITMENT_DEADLINE , A.ARTICLE_QUESTION_CATEGORY , A.USER_CODE , A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_CURRENT_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_PENDING_MEMBER_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_DELETE_STATUS FROM ARTICLE A WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode}

SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID , A.ARTICLE_TITLE , A.USER_CODE , A.ARTICLE_CATEGORY , A.ARTICLE_CONTENT , A.ARTICLE_LIKE_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPLY_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_VIEW_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_LAST_UPDATE_DATE , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_MAX_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_CURRENT_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_RECRUITMENT_DEADLINE , A.STUDYGROUP_PENDING_MEMBER_COUNT , B.REPLY_ID , B.REPLY_CONTENT , B.USER_CODE AS REPLY_USER_CODE , B.REPLY_CREATE_DATE , B.REPLY_LAST_UPDATE_DATE , B.REPLY_LIKE_COUNT FROM ARTICLE A INNER JOIN REPLY B ON (A.ARTICLE_ID = B.ARTICLE_ID) WHERE A.ARTICLE_ID = #{ articleId } AND A.ARTICLE_CATEGORY = #{ studyCate }

SELECT A.ARTICLE_ID , A.ARTICLE_TITLE , A.ARTICLE_CONTENT , A.ARTICLE_CATEGORY , A.ARTICLE_CREATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_LAST_UPDATE_DATE , A.ARTICLE_VIEW_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_LIKE_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPLY_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_REPORT_STATUS , A.STUDYGROUP_MEMBER_MAX_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_RECRUITMENT_DEADLINE , A.ARTICLE_QUESTION_CATEGORY , A.USER_CODE , A.STUDYGROUP_ID , A.STUDYGROUP_CURRENT_MEMBER_COUNT , A.STUDYGROUP_PENDING_MEMBER_COUNT , A.ARTICLE_DELETE_STATUS FROM ARTICLE A WHERE DATE(articleCreateDate) = CURDATE();
